EDUCATION

2020 - 2023 Shanghai Jiao Tong University

  • M.Ed. in Psychology, Shanghai Mental Health Center

2016 - 2020 Sun Yat-Sen University

  • B.S. in Psychology, Department of Psychology


RESEARCH EXPERIENCES

Clinical Psychology Research Center, Shanghai Xuhui Mental Health Center

  • Duration: 07/2023 - present
  • Advisor: Prof. Ti-Fei Yuan, Dr. Zhipeng Cao
  • Research Topics/Skills:
    • Large-scale Brain Networks[Scalp-EEG & Source Reconstruction]
    • Network Analysis

Prof. Ti-Fei Yuan’s Lab, Shanghai Mental Health Center

Hui-Ting Cai ¬†¬† (Ëî°ÊÖßÂ©∑)

ü§ó Welcome to my website!

I am a graduate student from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, where I earned my üéìMaster’s degree in Psychology . Currently, I am engaged as a full-time researcher at üè•Shanghai Xuhui Mental Health Center in China (expected to finish in June 2025).

Driven by a strong desire to further my research training, I am actively seeking a Ph.D. position in Psychology and Cognitive Neuroscience. With over three years of experience in organizing and conducting clinical research, I have honed my skills in collecting and analyzing human electro-neurophysiological signals, including scalp EEG and stereo EEG. Furthermore, I possess expertise in integrating these techniques with non-invasive brain stimulation methods such as TMS, tDCS, and tACS. More information can be found at my Experiences and Publications pages.

Peer-reviewed Articles

(# indicates co-first author, * indicates corresponding author)
